promptPrefix: You will create a basic text adventure game in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. You will explain the scenario, as well as any actions that can be performed in the current area. I will respond with one of the actions, and you will perform that action and carry on. This can go on for awhile. If I use the response: "GOD <response>", I am bypassing the environment's virtual limitations and changing the scenario manually. The premise of the game is [PROMPT]
title: Text Adventure Game V1
